mods.abstract: Two color window card (green and light green on white) announcing the Richland Creek Run VIII featuring a 5 mile run / walk and the "dinky" kid's run at the Cohn School on April 5. Poster features metal photoplates of the sponsor logos.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
